verses.text_uthmani: كٓهيعٓصٓ

translations.text: Kãf-Ha-Ya-’Aĩn- Ṣãd.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kaf-ha-ya-AAayn-sad
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ذِكْرُ رَحْمَتِ رَبِّكَ عَبْدَهُۥ زَكَرِيَّآ

translations.text: ˹This is˺ a reminder of your Lord’s mercy to His servant Zachariah,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thikru rahmati rabbika AAabdahuzakariyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥ نِدَآءً خَفِيًّا

translations.text: when he cried out to his Lord privately,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ith nada rabbahu nidaankhafiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّى وَهَنَ ٱلْعَظْمُ مِنِّى وَٱشْتَعَلَ ٱلرَّأْسُ شَيْبًا وَلَمْ أَكُنۢ بِدُعَآئِكَ رَبِّ شَقِيًّا

translations.text: saying, “My Lord! Surely my bones have become brittle, and grey hair has spread across my head, but I have never been disappointed in my prayer to You, my Lord!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala rabbi innee wahana alAAathmuminnee washtaAAala arra/su shayban walam akunbiduAAa-ika rabbi shaqiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنِّى خِفْتُ ٱلْمَوَٰلِىَ مِن وَرَآءِى وَكَانَتِ ٱمْرَأَتِى عَاقِرًا فَهَبْ لِى مِن لَّدُنكَ وَلِيًّا

translations.text: And I am concerned about ˹the faith of˺ my relatives after me, since my wife is barren. So grant me, by Your grace, an heir,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-innee khiftu almawaliya min wara-eewakanati imraatee AAaqiran fahab lee min ladunkawaliyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَرِثُنِى وَيَرِثُ مِنْ ءَالِ يَعْقُوبَ ۖ وَٱجْعَلْهُ رَبِّ رَضِيًّا

translations.text: who will inherit ˹prophethood˺ from me and the family of Jacob, and make him, O  Lord, pleasing ˹to You˺!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yarithunee wayarithu min ali yaAAqoobawajAAalhu rabbi radiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَـٰزَكَرِيَّآ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَـٰمٍ ٱسْمُهُۥ يَحْيَىٰ لَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُۥ مِن قَبْلُ سَمِيًّا

translations.text: ˹The angels announced,˺ “O Zachariah! Indeed, We give you the good news of ˹the birth of˺ a son, whose name will be John—a name We have not given to anyone before.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ya zakariyya innanubashshiruka bighulamin ismuhu yahya lamnajAAal lahu min qablu samiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِى غُلَـٰمٌ وَكَانَتِ ٱمْرَأَتِى عَاقِرًا وَقَدْ بَلَغْتُ مِنَ ٱلْكِبَرِ عِتِيًّا

translations.text: He wondered, “My Lord! How can I have a son when my wife is barren, and I have become extremely old?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala rabbi anna yakoonu leeghulamun wakanati imraatee AAaqiran waqadbalaghtu mina alkibari AAitiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ قَالَ رَبُّكَ هُوَ عَلَىَّ هَيِّنٌ وَقَدْ خَلَقْتُكَ مِن قَبْلُ وَلَمْ تَكُ شَيْـًٔا

translations.text: An angel replied, “So will it be! Your Lord says, ‘It is easy for Me, just as I created you before, when you were nothing!’”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala kathalika qalarabbuka huwa AAalayya hayyinun waqad khalaqtuka min qablu walamtaku shay-a
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱجْعَل لِّىٓ ءَايَةً ۚ قَالَ ءَايَتُكَ أَلَّا تُكَلِّمَ ٱلنَّاسَ ثَلَـٰثَ لَيَالٍ سَوِيًّا

translations.text: Zachariah said, “My Lord! Grant me a sign.” He responded, “Your sign is that you will not ˹be able to˺ speak to people for three nights, despite being healthy.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala rabbi ijAAal lee ayatan qalaayatuka alla tukallima annasa thalathalayalin sawiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَخَرَجَ عَلَىٰ قَوْمِهِۦ مِنَ ٱلْمِحْرَابِ فَأَوْحَىٰٓ إِلَيْهِمْ أَن سَبِّحُوا۟ بُكْرَةً وَعَشِيًّا

translations.text: So he came out to his people from the sanctuary, signalling to them to glorify ˹Allah˺ morning and evening.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fakharaja AAala qawmihi mina almihrabifaawha ilayhim an sabbihoo bukratan waAAashiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَـٰيَحْيَىٰ خُذِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ بِقُوَّةٍ ۖ وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلْحُكْمَ صَبِيًّا

translations.text: ˹It was later said,˺ “O John! Hold firmly to the Scriptures.” And We granted him wisdom while ˹he was still˺ a child,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ya yahya khuthialkitaba biquwwatin waataynahu alhukmasabiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَحَنَانًا مِّن لَّدُنَّا وَزَكَوٰةً ۖ وَكَانَ تَقِيًّا

translations.text: as well as purity and compassion from Us. And he was God-fearing,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wahananan min ladunnawazakatan wakana taqiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَبَرًّۢا بِوَٰلِدَيْهِ وَلَمْ يَكُن جَبَّارًا عَصِيًّا

translations.text: and kind to his parents. He was neither arrogant nor disobedient.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wabarran biwalidayhi walam yakun jabbaranAAasiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَسَلَـٰمٌ عَلَيْهِ يَوْمَ وُلِدَ وَيَوْمَ يَمُوتُ وَيَوْمَ يُبْعَثُ حَيًّا

translations.text: Peace be upon him the day he was born, and the day of his death, and the day he will be raised back to life!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wasalamun AAalayhi yawma wulidawayawma yamootu wayawma yubAAathu hayya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مَرْيَمَ إِذِ ٱنتَبَذَتْ مِنْ أَهْلِهَا مَكَانًا شَرْقِيًّا

translations.text: And mention in the Book ˹O Prophet, the story of˺ Mary when she withdrew from her family to a place in the east,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wathkur fee alkitabimaryama ithi intabathat min ahliha makanansharqiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱتَّخَذَتْ مِن دُونِهِمْ حِجَابًا فَأَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْهَا رُوحَنَا فَتَمَثَّلَ لَهَا بَشَرًا سَوِيًّا

translation.text: then he assumed for her the likeness
then he assumed for her the likeness

translations.text: screening herself off from them. Then We sent to her Our angel, ˹Gabriel,˺ appearing before her as a man, perfectly formed.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fattakhathat min doonihim hijabanfaarsalna ilayha roohanafatamaththala laha basharan sawiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَتْ إِنِّىٓ أَعُوذُ بِٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ مِنكَ إِن كُنتَ تَقِيًّا

translations.text: She appealed, “I truly seek refuge in the Most Compassionate from you! ˹So leave me alone˺ if you are God-fearing.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qalat innee aAAoothu birrahmaniminka in kunta taqiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ رَسُولُ رَبِّكِ لِأَهَبَ لَكِ غُلَـٰمًا زَكِيًّا

translations.text: He responded, “I am only a messenger from your Lord, ˹sent˺ to bless you with a pure son.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala innama ana rasoolurabbiki li-ahaba laki ghulaman zakiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَتْ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِى غُلَـٰمٌ وَلَمْ يَمْسَسْنِى بَشَرٌ وَلَمْ أَكُ بَغِيًّا

translations.text: She wondered, “How can I have a son when no man has ever touched me, nor am I unchaste?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qalat anna yakoonu lee ghulamunwalam yamsasnee basharun walam aku baghiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِ هُوَ عَلَىَّ هَيِّنٌ ۖ وَلِنَجْعَلَهُۥٓ ءَايَةً لِّلنَّاسِ وَرَحْمَةً مِّنَّا ۚ وَكَانَ أَمْرًا مَّقْضِيًّا

translation.text: and so that We will make him

translations.text: He replied, “So will it be! Your Lord says, ‘It is easy for Me. And so will We make him a sign for humanity and a mercy from Us.’ It is a matter ˹already˺ decreed.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala kathaliki qalarabbuki huwa AAalayya hayyinun walinajAAalahu ayatan linnasiwarahmatan minna wakana amran maqdiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ فَحَمَلَتْهُ فَٱنتَبَذَتْ بِهِۦ مَكَانًا قَصِيًّا

translations.text: So she conceived him and withdrew with him to a remote place.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fahamalat-hu fantabathatbihi makanan qasiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَجَآءَهَا ٱلْمَخَاضُ إِلَىٰ جِذْعِ ٱلنَّخْلَةِ قَالَتْ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى مِتُّ قَبْلَ هَـٰذَا وَكُنتُ نَسْيًا مَّنسِيًّا

translations.text: Then the pains of labour drove her to the trunk of a palm tree. She cried, “Alas! I wish I had died before this, and was a thing long forgotten!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faajaaha almakhadu ilajithAAi annakhlati qalat ya laytaneemittu qabla hatha wakuntu nasyan mansiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَنَادَىٰهَا مِن تَحْتِهَآ أَلَّا تَحْزَنِى قَدْ جَعَلَ رَبُّكِ تَحْتَكِ سَرِيًّا

translations.text: So a voice<sup foot_note=76916>1</sup> reassured her from below her, “Do not grieve! Your Lord has provided a stream at your feet.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fanadaha min tahtihaalla tahzanee qad jaAAala rabbuki tahtakisariyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَهُزِّىٓ إِلَيْكِ بِجِذْعِ ٱلنَّخْلَةِ تُسَـٰقِطْ عَلَيْكِ رُطَبًا جَنِيًّا

translations.text: And shake the trunk of this palm tree towards you, it will drop fresh, ripe dates upon you.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wahuzzee ilayki bijithAAi annakhlatitusaqit AAalayki rutaban janiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَكُلِى وَٱشْرَبِى وَقَرِّى عَيْنًا ۖ فَإِمَّا تَرَيِنَّ مِنَ ٱلْبَشَرِ أَحَدًا فَقُولِىٓ إِنِّى نَذَرْتُ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ صَوْمًا فَلَنْ أُكَلِّمَ ٱلْيَوْمَ إِنسِيًّا

translations.text: So eat and drink, and put your heart at ease. But if you see any of the people, say, ‘I have vowed silence<sup foot_note=76917>1</sup> to the Most Compassionate, so I am not talking to anyone today.’”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fakulee washrabee waqarree AAaynanfa-imma tarayinna mina albashari ahadan faqooleeinnee nathartu lirrahmani sawmanfalan okallima alyawma insiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَتَتْ بِهِۦ قَوْمَهَا تَحْمِلُهُۥ ۖ قَالُوا۟ يَـٰمَرْيَمُ لَقَدْ جِئْتِ شَيْـًٔا فَرِيًّا

translations.text: Then she returned to her people, carrying him. They said ˹in shock˺, “O Mary! You have certainly done a horrible thing!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faatat bihi qawmaha tahmiluhuqaloo ya maryamu laqad ji/ti shay-an fariyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَـٰٓأُخْتَ هَـٰرُونَ مَا كَانَ أَبُوكِ ٱمْرَأَ سَوْءٍ وَمَا كَانَتْ أُمُّكِ بَغِيًّا

translations.text: O  sister of Aaron!<sup foot_note=76918>1</sup> Your father was not an indecent man, nor was your mother unchaste.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ya okhta haroona ma kanaabooki imraa saw-in wama kanat ommuki baghiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَأَشَارَتْ إِلَيْهِ ۖ قَالُوا۟ كَيْفَ نُكَلِّمُ مَن كَانَ فِى ٱلْمَهْدِ صَبِيًّا

translations.text: So she pointed to the baby. They exclaimed, “How can we talk to someone who is an infant in the cradle?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faasharat ilayhi qaloo kayfanukallimu man kana fee almahdi sabiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ إِنِّى عَبْدُ ٱللَّهِ ءَاتَىٰنِىَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَجَعَلَنِى نَبِيًّا

translations.text: Jesus declared, “I am truly a servant of Allah. He has destined me to be given the Scripture and to be a prophet.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala innee AAabdu Allahi ataniyaalkitaba wajaAAalanee nabiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَجَعَلَنِى مُبَارَكًا أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُ وَأَوْصَـٰنِى بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَٱلزَّكَوٰةِ مَا دُمْتُ حَيًّا

translations.text: He has made me a blessing wherever I go, and bid me to establish prayer and give alms-tax as long as I live,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WajaAAalanee mubarakan aynamakuntu waawsanee bissalati wazzakatima dumtu hayya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَبَرًّۢا بِوَٰلِدَتِى وَلَمْ يَجْعَلْنِى جَبَّارًا شَقِيًّا

translations.text: and to be kind to my mother. He has not made me arrogant or defiant.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wabarran biwalidatee walam yajAAalneejabbaran shaqiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱلسَّلَـٰمُ عَلَىَّ يَوْمَ وُلِدتُّ وَيَوْمَ أَمُوتُ وَيَوْمَ أُبْعَثُ حَيًّا

translations.text: Peace be upon me the day I was born, the day I die, and the day I will be raised back to life!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wassalamu AAalayya yawmawulidtu wayawma amootu wayawma obAAathu hayya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ذَٰلِكَ عِيسَى ٱبْنُ مَرْيَمَ ۚ قَوْلَ ٱلْحَقِّ ٱلَّذِى فِيهِ يَمْتَرُونَ

translations.text: That is Jesus, son of Mary. ˹And this is˺ a word of truth, about which they dispute.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thalika AAeesa ibnu maryamaqawla alhaqqi allathee feehi yamtaroon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: مَا كَانَ لِلَّهِ أَن يَتَّخِذَ مِن وَلَدٍ ۖ سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥٓ ۚ إِذَا قَضَىٰٓ أَمْرًا فَإِنَّمَا يَقُولُ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

translations.text: It is not for Allah to take a son! Glory be to Him. When He decrees a matter, He simply tells it, “Be!” And it is!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ma kana lillahi anyattakhitha min waladin subhanahu itha qadaamran fa-innama yaqoolu lahu kun fayakoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ رَبِّى وَرَبُّكُمْ فَٱعْبُدُوهُ ۚ هَـٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ مُّسْتَقِيمٌ

translations.text: ˹Jesus also declared,˺ “Surely Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him ˹alone˺. This is the Straight Path.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-inna Allaha rabbee warabbukum faAAbudoohuhatha siratun mustaqeem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَٱخْتَلَفَ ٱلْأَحْزَابُ مِنۢ بَيْنِهِمْ ۖ فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِن مَّشْهَدِ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ

translations.text: Yet their ˹various˺ groups have differed among themselves ˹about him˺, so woe to the disbelievers when they face a tremendous Day!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fakhtalafa al-ahzabumin baynihim fawaylun lillatheena kafaroo min mashhadiyawmin AAatheem
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَسْمِعْ بِهِمْ وَأَبْصِرْ يَوْمَ يَأْتُونَنَا ۖ لَـٰكِنِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ ٱلْيَوْمَ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ

translations.text: How clearly will they hear and see on the Day they will come to Us! But today the wrongdoers are clearly astray.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AsmiAA bihim waabsir yawma ya/toonanalakini aththalimoona alyawmafee dalalin mubeen
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَنذِرْهُمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْحَسْرَةِ إِذْ قُضِىَ ٱلْأَمْرُ وَهُمْ فِى غَفْلَةٍ وَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ

translations.text: And warn them ˹O Prophet˺ of the Day of Regret, when all matters will be settled, while they are ˹engrossed˺ in heedlessness and disbelief.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waanthirhum yawma alhasrati ithqudiya al-amru wahum fee ghaflatin wahum layu/minoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَرِثُ ٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَنْ عَلَيْهَا وَإِلَيْنَا يُرْجَعُونَ

translations.text: Indeed, it is We Who will succeed the earth and whoever is on it. And to Us they will ˹all˺ be returned.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna nahnu narithu al-ardawaman AAalayha wa-ilayna yurjaAAoon
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقًا نَّبِيًّا

translations.text: And mention in the Book ˹O Prophet, the story of˺ Abraham. He was surely a man of truth and a prophet.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wathkur fee alkitabiibraheema innahu kana siddeeqan nabiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ يَـٰٓأَبَتِ لِمَ تَعْبُدُ مَا لَا يَسْمَعُ وَلَا يُبْصِرُ وَلَا يُغْنِى عَنكَ شَيْـًٔا

translations.text: ˹Remember˺ when he said to his father, “O dear father! Why do you worship what can neither hear nor see, nor benefit you at all?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ith qala li-abeehi yaabati lima taAAbudu ma la yasmaAAu wala yubsiruwala yughnee AAanka shay-a
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ إِنِّى قَدْ جَآءَنِى مِنَ ٱلْعِلْمِ مَا لَمْ يَأْتِكَ فَٱتَّبِعْنِىٓ أَهْدِكَ صِرَٰطًا سَوِيًّا

translations.text: O  dear father! I have certainly received some knowledge which you have not received, so follow me and I will guide you to the Straight Path.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ya abati innee qad jaanee minaalAAilmi ma lam ya/tika fattabiAAnee ahdika siratansawiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ لَا تَعْبُدِ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ ۖ إِنَّ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنَ كَانَ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عَصِيًّا

translations.text: O  dear father! Do not worship Satan. Surely Satan is ever rebellious against the Most Compassionate.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ya abati la taAAbudi ashshaytanainna ashshaytana kana lirrahmaniAAasiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَـٰٓأَبَتِ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ أَن يَمَسَّكَ عَذَابٌ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ فَتَكُونَ لِلشَّيْطَـٰنِ وَلِيًّا

translations.text: O  dear father! I truly fear that you will be touched by a torment from the Most Compassionate, and become Satan’s companion ˹in Hell˺.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ya abati innee akhafu anyamassaka AAathabun mina arrahmanifatakoona lishshyatani waliyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ أَرَاغِبٌ أَنتَ عَنْ ءَالِهَتِى يَـٰٓإِبْرَٰهِيمُ ۖ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ لَأَرْجُمَنَّكَ ۖ وَٱهْجُرْنِى مَلِيًّا

translations.text: He threatened, “How dare you reject my idols, O  Abraham! If you do not desist, I will certainly stone you ˹to death˺. So be gone from me for a long time!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala araghibun anta AAan alihateeya ibraheemu la-in lam tantahi laarjumannaka wahjurneemaliyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قَالَ سَلَـٰمٌ عَلَيْكَ ۖ سَأَسْتَغْفِرُ لَكَ رَبِّىٓ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ بِى حَفِيًّا

translations.text: Abraham responded, “Peace be upon you! I will pray to my Lord for your forgiveness. He has truly been Most Gracious to me.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qala salamun AAalaykasaastaghfiru laka rabbee innahu kana bee hafiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَعْتَزِلُكُمْ وَمَا تَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَدْعُوا۟ رَبِّى عَسَىٰٓ أَلَّآ أَكُونَ بِدُعَآءِ رَبِّى شَقِيًّا

translations.text: As I distance myself from ˹all of˺ you and from whatever you invoke besides Allah, I will ˹continue to˺ call upon my Lord ˹alone˺, trusting that I will never be disappointed in invoking my Lord.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WaaAAtazilukum wama tadAAoona mindooni Allahi waadAAoo rabbee AAasa allaakoona biduAAa-i rabbee shaqiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَمَّا ٱعْتَزَلَهُمْ وَمَا يَعْبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَهَبْنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسْحَـٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ ۖ وَكُلًّا جَعَلْنَا نَبِيًّا

translations.text: So after he had left them and what they worshipped besides Allah, We granted him Isaac and Jacob, and made each of them a prophet.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Falamma iAAtazalahum wamayaAAbudoona min dooni Allahi wahabna lahu ishaqawayaAAqooba wakullan jaAAalna nabiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُم مِّن رَّحْمَتِنَا وَجَعَلْنَا لَهُمْ لِسَانَ صِدْقٍ عَلِيًّا

translations.text: We showered them with Our mercy, and blessed them with honourable mention.<sup foot_note=76919>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wawahabna lahum min rahmatinawajaAAalna lahum lisana sidqin AAaliyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مُوسَىٰٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ مُخْلَصًا وَكَانَ رَسُولًا نَّبِيًّا

translations.text: And mention in the Book ˹O Prophet, the story of˺ Moses. He was truly a chosen man, and was a messenger and a prophet.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wathkur fee alkitabimoosa innahu kana mukhlasan wakanarasoolan nabiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَنَـٰدَيْنَـٰهُ مِن جَانِبِ ٱلطُّورِ ٱلْأَيْمَنِ وَقَرَّبْنَـٰهُ نَجِيًّا

translations.text: We called him from the right side of Mount Ṭûr, and drew him near, speaking ˹with him˺ directly.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wanadaynahu min janibiattoori al-aymani waqarrabnahu najiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥ مِن رَّحْمَتِنَآ أَخَاهُ هَـٰرُونَ نَبِيًّا

translations.text: And We appointed for him—out of Our grace—his brother, Aaron, as a prophet.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wawahabna lahu min rahmatinaakhahu haroona nabiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ إِسْمَـٰعِيلَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صَادِقَ ٱلْوَعْدِ وَكَانَ رَسُولًا نَّبِيًّا

translations.text: And mention in the Book ˹O Prophet, the story of˺ Ishmael. He was truly a man of his word, and was a messenger and a prophet.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wathkur fee alkitabiismaAAeela innahu kana sadiqa alwaAAdi wakanarasoolan nabiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَكَانَ يَأْمُرُ أَهْلَهُۥ بِٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَٱلزَّكَوٰةِ وَكَانَ عِندَ رَبِّهِۦ مَرْضِيًّا

translations.text: He used to urge his people to pray and give alms-tax. And his Lord was well pleased with him.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakana ya/muru ahlahu bissalatiwazzakati wakana AAinda rabbihi mardiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱذْكُرْ فِى ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ إِدْرِيسَ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صِدِّيقًا نَّبِيًّا

translations.text: And mention in the Book ˹O Prophet, the story of˺ Enoch. He was surely a man of truth and a prophet.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wathkur fee alkitabiidreesa innahu kana siddeeqan nabiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَرَفَعْنَـٰهُ مَكَانًا عَلِيًّا

translations.text: And We elevated him to an honourable status.<sup foot_note=76920>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: WarafaAAnahu makanan AAaliyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَنْعَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيْهِم مِّنَ ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ مِن ذُرِّيَّةِ ءَادَمَ وَمِمَّنْ حَمَلْنَا مَعَ نُوحٍ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّةِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ وَمِمَّنْ هَدَيْنَا وَٱجْتَبَيْنَآ ۚ إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ خَرُّوا۟ سُجَّدًا وَبُكِيًّا ۩

translations.text: Those were ˹some of˺ the prophets who Allah has blessed from among the descendants of Adam, and of those We carried with Noah ˹in the Ark˺, and of the descendants of Abraham and Israel,<sup foot_note=76921>1</sup> and of those We ˹rightly˺ guided and chose. Whenever the revelations of the Most Compassionate were recited to them, they fell down, prostrating and weeping.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ola-ika allatheena anAAama AllahuAAalayhim mina annabiyyeena min thurriyyati adamawamimman hamalna maAAa noohin wamin thurriyyatiibraheema wa-isra-eela wamimman hadayna wajtabaynaitha tutla AAalayhim ayatu arrahmanikharroo sujjadan wabukiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ۞ فَخَلَفَ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ خَلْفٌ أَضَاعُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ ٱلشَّهَوَٰتِ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَلْقَوْنَ غَيًّا

translations.text: But they were succeeded by generations who neglected prayer and followed their lusts and so will soon face the evil consequences.<sup foot_note=76922>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fakhalafa min baAAdihim khalfun adaAAooassalata wattabaAAoo ashshahawatifasawfa yalqawna ghayya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِلَّا مَن تَابَ وَءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًا فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يَدْخُلُونَ ٱلْجَنَّةَ وَلَا يُظْلَمُونَ شَيْـًٔا

translations.text: As for those who repent, believe, and do good, it is they who will be admitted into Paradise, never being denied any reward.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Illa man taba waamanawaAAamila salihan faola-ika yadkhuloonaaljannata wala yuthlamoona shay-a
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: جَنَّـٰتِ عَدْنٍ ٱلَّتِى وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ عِبَادَهُۥ بِٱلْغَيْبِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ وَعْدُهُۥ مَأْتِيًّا

translations.text: ˹They will be in˺ the Gardens of Eternity, promised in trust by the Most Compassionate to His servants. Surely His promise will be fulfilled.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Jannati AAadnin allatee waAAada arrahmanuAAibadahu bighaybi innahu kana waAAduhuma/tiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا إِلَّا سَلَـٰمًا ۖ وَلَهُمْ رِزْقُهُمْ فِيهَا بُكْرَةً وَعَشِيًّا

translations.text: There they will never hear any idle talk—only ˹greetings of˺ peace. And there they will have their provisions morning and evening.<sup foot_note=76923>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: La yasmaAAoona feeha laghwanilla salaman walahum rizquhum feeha bukratanwaAAashiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: تِلْكَ ٱلْجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِى نُورِثُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا مَن كَانَ تَقِيًّا

translations.text: That is Paradise, which We will grant to whoever is devout among Our servants.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Tilka aljannatu allatee noorithu min AAibadinaman kana taqiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا نَتَنَزَّلُ إِلَّا بِأَمْرِ رَبِّكَ ۖ لَهُۥ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِينَا وَمَا خَلْفَنَا وَمَا بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ ۚ وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ نَسِيًّا

translations.text: “We only descend by the command of your Lord. To Him belongs whatever is before us, and whatever is behind us, and everything in between. And your Lord is never forgetful.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama natanazzalu illa bi-amrirabbika lahu ma bayna aydeena wama khalfanawama bayna thalika wama kana rabbukanasiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: رَّبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فَٱعْبُدْهُ وَٱصْطَبِرْ لِعِبَـٰدَتِهِۦ ۚ هَلْ تَعْلَمُ لَهُۥ سَمِيًّا

translations.text: ˹He is the˺ Lord of the heavens, and the earth, and everything in between. So worship Him ˹alone˺, and be steadfast in His worship. Do you know of anyone equal to Him ˹in His attributes˺?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Rabbu assamawati wal-ardiwama baynahuma faAAbudhu wastabirliAAibadatihi hal taAAlamu lahu samiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَيَقُولُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَءِذَا مَا مِتُّ لَسَوْفَ أُخْرَجُ حَيًّا

translations.text: Yet ˹some˺ people ask ˹mockingly˺, “After I die, will I really be raised to life again?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayaqoolu al-insanu a-itha mamittu lasawfa okhraju hayya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَوَلَا يَذْكُرُ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَـٰهُ مِن قَبْلُ وَلَمْ يَكُ شَيْـًٔا

translations.text: Do ˹such˺ people not remember that We created them before, when they were nothing?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Awa la yathkuru al-insanuanna khalaqnahu min qablu walam yaku shay-a
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَحْشُرَنَّهُمْ وَٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ ثُمَّ لَنُحْضِرَنَّهُمْ حَوْلَ جَهَنَّمَ جِثِيًّا

translations.text: By your Lord ˹O Prophet˺! We will surely gather them along with the devils, and then set them around Hell on their knees.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fawarabbika lanahshurannahum washshayateenathumma lanuhdirannahum hawla jahannama jithiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ لَنَنزِعَنَّ مِن كُلِّ شِيعَةٍ أَيُّهُمْ أَشَدُّ عَلَى ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عِتِيًّا

translations.text: Then We will certainly begin by dragging out of every group the ones most defiant to the Most Compassionate.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma lananziAAanna min kulli sheeAAatinayyuhum ashaddu AAala arrahmaniAAitiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ لَنَحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ أَوْلَىٰ بِهَا صِلِيًّا

translations.text: And We truly know best who is most deserving of burning in it.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma lanahnu aAAlamu billatheenahum awla biha siliyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِن مِّنكُمْ إِلَّا وَارِدُهَا ۚ كَانَ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ حَتْمًا مَّقْضِيًّا

translations.text: There is none of you who will not pass over it.<sup foot_note=76924>1</sup> ˹This is˺ a decree your Lord must fulfil.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-in minkum illa wariduhakana AAala rabbika hatman maqdiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ثُمَّ نُنَجِّى ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوا۟ وَّنَذَرُ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ فِيهَا جِثِيًّا

translations.text: Then We will deliver those who were devout, leaving the wrongdoers there on their knees.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thumma nunajjee allatheena ittaqawwanatharu aththalimeena feehajithiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَإِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتُنَا بَيِّنَـٰتٍ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ أَىُّ ٱلْفَرِيقَيْنِ خَيْرٌ مَّقَامًا وَأَحْسَنُ نَدِيًّا

translations.text: When Our clear revelations are recited to them, the disbelievers ask the believers ˹mockingly˺, “Which of the two of us is better in status and superior in assembly?”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wa-itha tutla AAalayhim ayatunabayyinatin qala allatheena kafaroo lillatheenaamanoo ayyu alfareeqayni khayrun maqaman waahsanunadiyya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَحْسَنُ أَثَـٰثًا وَرِءْيًا

translations.text: ˹Imagine, O  Prophet˺ how many peoples We have destroyed before them, who were far better in luxury and splendour!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakam ahlakna qablahum min qarnin humahsanu athathan wari/ya
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: قُلْ مَن كَانَ فِى ٱلضَّلَـٰلَةِ فَلْيَمْدُدْ لَهُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ مَدًّا ۚ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوْا۟ مَا يُوعَدُونَ إِمَّا ٱلْعَذَابَ وَإِمَّا ٱلسَّاعَةَ فَسَيَعْلَمُونَ مَنْ هُوَ شَرٌّ مَّكَانًا وَأَضْعَفُ جُندًا

translations.text: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Whoever is ˹entrenched˺ in misguidance, the Most Compassionate will allow them plenty of time, until—behold!—they face what they are threatened with: either the torment or the Hour. Only then will they realize who is worse in position and inferior in manpower.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qul man kana fee addalalatifalyamdud lahu arrahmanu maddan hattaitha raaw ma yooAAadoona imma alAAathabawa-imma assaAAata fasayaAAlamoona man huwasharrun makanan waadAAafu junda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَيَزِيدُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱهْتَدَوْا۟ هُدًى ۗ وَٱلْبَـٰقِيَـٰتُ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتُ خَيْرٌ عِندَ رَبِّكَ ثَوَابًا وَخَيْرٌ مَّرَدًّا

translations.text: And Allah increases in guidance those who are ˹rightly˺ guided. And the everlasting good deeds are far better with your Lord in reward and in outcome.<sup foot_note=76925>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wayazeedu Allahu allatheenaihtadaw hudan walbaqiyatu assalihatukhayrun AAinda rabbika thawaban wakhayrun maradda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَفَرَءَيْتَ ٱلَّذِى كَفَرَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا وَقَالَ لَأُوتَيَنَّ مَالًا وَوَلَدًا

translations.text: Have you seen ˹O Prophet˺ the one<sup foot_note=76926>1</sup> who rejects Our revelations yet boasts, “I will definitely be granted ˹plenty of˺ wealth and children ˹if there is an afterlife˺.”?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Afaraayta allathee kafara bi-ayatinawaqala laootayanna malan wawalada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَطَّلَعَ ٱلْغَيْبَ أَمِ ٱتَّخَذَ عِندَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عَهْدًا

translations.text: Has he looked into the unseen or taken a pledge from the Most Compassionate?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: AttalaAAa alghayba ami ittakhathaAAinda arrahmani AAahda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَلَّا ۚ سَنَكْتُبُ مَا يَقُولُ وَنَمُدُّ لَهُۥ مِنَ ٱلْعَذَابِ مَدًّا

translations.text: Not at all! We certainly record whatever he claims and will increase his punishment extensively.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kalla sanaktubu ma yaqooluwanamuddu lahu mina alAAathabi madda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَنَرِثُهُۥ مَا يَقُولُ وَيَأْتِينَا فَرْدًا

translation.text: and he will come to Us

translations.text: And We will inherit what he boasts of, and he will come before Us all by himself.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wanarithuhu ma yaqoolu waya/teenafarda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةً لِّيَكُونُوا۟ لَهُمْ عِزًّا

translations.text: They have taken other gods, instead of Allah, seeking strength ˹and protection˺ through them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wattakhathoo min dooni Allahialihatan liyakoonoo lahum AAizza
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: كَلَّا ۚ سَيَكْفُرُونَ بِعِبَادَتِهِمْ وَيَكُونُونَ عَلَيْهِمْ ضِدًّا

translations.text: But no! Those ˹gods˺ will deny their worship and turn against them.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kalla sayakfuroona biAAibadatihimwayakoonoona AAalayhim didda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّآ أَرْسَلْنَا ٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ تَؤُزُّهُمْ أَزًّا

translations.text: Do you ˹O Prophet˺ not see that We have sent the devils against the disbelievers, constantly inciting them?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Alam tara anna arsalna ashshayateenaAAala alkafireena taozzuhum azza
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَلَا تَعْجَلْ عَلَيْهِمْ ۖ إِنَّمَا نَعُدُّ لَهُمْ عَدًّا

translations.text: So do not be in haste against them, for indeed We are ˹closely˺ counting down their days.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fala taAAjal AAalayhim innamanaAAuddu lahum AAadda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ نَحْشُرُ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ إِلَى ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ وَفْدًا

translations.text: ˹Watch for˺ the Day We will gather the righteous before the Most Compassionate as an honoured delegation,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yawma nahshuru almuttaqeena ilaarrahmani wafda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَنَسُوقُ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ وِرْدًا

translations.text: and drive the wicked to Hell like a thirsty herd.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wanasooqu almujrimeena ila jahannamawirda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَّا يَمْلِكُونَ ٱلشَّفَـٰعَةَ إِلَّا مَنِ ٱتَّخَذَ عِندَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عَهْدًا

translations.text: None will have the right to intercede, except those who have taken a covenant from the Most Compassionate.<sup foot_note=76927>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: La yamlikoona ashshafaAAatailla mani ittakhatha AAinda arrahmaniAAahda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَقَالُوا۟ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَلَدًا

translations.text: They<sup foot_note=76928>1</sup> say, “The Most Compassionate has offspring.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqaloo ittakhatha arrahmanuwalada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَّقَدْ جِئْتُمْ شَيْـًٔا إِدًّا

translations.text: You have certainly made an outrageous claim,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Laqad ji/tum shay-an idda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: تَكَادُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ يَتَفَطَّرْنَ مِنْهُ وَتَنشَقُّ ٱلْأَرْضُ وَتَخِرُّ ٱلْجِبَالُ هَدًّا

translations.text: by which the heavens are about to burst, the earth to split apart, and the mountains to crumble to pieces
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Takadu assamawatuyatafattarna minhu watanshaqqu al-ardu watakhirrualjibalu hadda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: أَن دَعَوْا۟ لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ وَلَدًا

translations.text: in protest of attributing children to the Most Compassionate.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: An daAAaw lirrahmaniwalada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَمَا يَنۢبَغِى لِلرَّحْمَـٰنِ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا

translations.text: It does not befit ˹the majesty of˺ the Most Compassionate to have children.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wama yanbaghee lirrahmanian yattakhitha walada
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِن كُلُّ مَن فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ إِلَّآ ءَاتِى ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ عَبْدًا

translations.text: There is none in the heavens or the earth who will not return to the Most Compassionate in full submission.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: In kullu man fee assamawatiwal-ardi illa atee arrahmaniAAabda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَّقَدْ أَحْصَىٰهُمْ وَعَدَّهُمْ عَدًّا

translations.text: Indeed, He fully knows them and has counted them precisely.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Laqad ahsahum waAAaddahum AAadda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَكُلُّهُمْ ءَاتِيهِ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ فَرْدًا

translations.text: And each of them will return to Him on the Day of Judgment all alone.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakulluhum ateehi yawma alqiyamatifarda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ سَيَجْعَلُ لَهُمُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وُدًّا

translations.text: As for those who believe and do good, the Most Compassionate will ˹certainly˺ bless them with ˹genuine˺ love.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna allatheena amanoowaAAamiloo assalihati sayajAAalu lahumu arrahmanuwudda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَإِنَّمَا يَسَّرْنَـٰهُ بِلِسَانِكَ لِتُبَشِّرَ بِهِ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ وَتُنذِرَ بِهِۦ قَوْمًا لُّدًّا

translation.text: that you may give glad tidings

translations.text: Indeed, We have made this ˹Quran˺ easy in your own language ˹O Prophet˺ so with it you may give good news to the righteous and warn those who are contentious.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fa-innama yassarnahu bilisanikalitubashshira bihi almuttaqeena watunthira bihi qawmanludda
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هَلْ تُحِسُّ مِنْهُم مِّنْ أَحَدٍ أَوْ تَسْمَعُ لَهُمْ رِكْزًۢا

translations.text: ˹Imagine˺ how many peoples We have destroyed before them! Do you ˹still˺ see any of them, or ˹even˺ hear from them the slightest sound?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wakam ahlakna qablahum min qarnin haltuhissu minhum min ahadin aw tasmaAAu lahum rikza
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
